Introduction

NEX7 (Chinese: 乐华七子NEXT; Korean: 넥스트; Japanese: ネクスト) (also known as NEXT) is a 7 member Chinese-Korean boy group under Yuehua Entertainment. They made their debut as a trainee group (NEX7) on June 21, 2018 but made their official debut (NEXT) on November 8, 2018 with 'WYTB'.

Current state:
